channel.title: Tutorial on Casual Inferences
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial on Casual Inferences

item.title: Presentations
item.description: This is a list of my previous presentations: Note: links to presentation materials are provided for illustration purposes only and may only represent preliminary findings that have since changed. Please refer to the publications for final results. Air pollution and greenness, and the risk of paediatric-onset inflammatory bowel disease. August 2019. International Society of Environmental Epidemiology (ISEE) 2019 Conference. Utrecht, the Netherlands. Poster Greenness as a protective factor for childhood-onset inflammatory bowel disease?
